pageSetting.title: 职能部室考核进度查询

attribute.value: select dmz as key, dmms as value from csb_dmms where 1=2
select fabh as key, famc as value from znbs_fapz where khnf=$khnf$ and khzq=$khzq$ and 'test'<>'test$khzq$' and khdx = '1'
select dmz as key, dmms as value from csb_dmms where 1=2
select distinct pffa.KHQS from znbs_zxpffa pffa inner join znbs_fapz fapz on pffa.fabh = fapz.fabh where fapz.khnf = $khnf$ and pffa.khzt = '1' and fapz.KHZQ=$khzq$
select dmz as key, dmms as value from csb_dmms where 1=2

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select a.khnf, a.fabh, a.famc, a.khzq, a.khzqmc, a.khqs, a.znbs, a.znbsmc, case when a.khzt='0' then '未开始' when a.khzt = '1' then '正在进行' else '已完成' end khzt, case when a.pfzt=0 then '未完成' else '已完成' end as pfzt from ( select a.khnf, a.fabh, a.famc, a.khzq, a.dmms as khzqmc, a.khqs, a.znbs, a.jgmc as znbsmc, a.khzt , case when sum(case when a.pfzt='1' then 0 else 1 end )>0 then 0 else 1 end as pfzt from ( select fapz.khnf, fapz.fabh, fapz.famc, fapz.khzq, dmms.dmms , pffa.khqs, fapz.znbs, jg.jgmc , pffa.khzt, pffa.pfzt from znbs_zxpffa pffa inner join znbs_fapz fapz on pffa.fabh = fapz.fabh inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = fapz.znbs inner join csb_dmms dmms on lower(dmms.dmmc) = 'khzq' and cast(dmms.dmz as integer) = cast(fapz.khzq as integer) where fapz.khdx='1' and pffa.fabh = $fabh$ and fapz.khzq = $khzq$ and fapz.khnf = $khnf$ and pffa.khqs = $khqs$ and jg.khdxdh in($jgkhdxdh$) and pffa.khzt = '$khzt$' group by fapz.khnf, fapz.fabh, fapz.famc, fapz.khzq, dmms.dmms , pffa.khqs, fapz.znbs, jg.jgmc, pffa.khzt, pffa.pfzt )a group by a.khnf, a.fabh, a.famc, a.khzq, a.dmms , a.khqs, a.znbs, a.jgmc, a.khzt )a where 1=1 and a.pfzt=$pfzt$ order by a.khnf, a.khzq, a.khqs

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select a.khnf, a.fabh, a.famc, a.khzq, a.khzqmc, a.khqs, a.znbs, a.znbsmc, case when a.khzt='0' then '未开始' when a.khzt = '1' then '正在进行' else '已完成' end khzt, case when a.pfzt=0 then '未完成' else '已完成' end as pfzt from ( select a.khnf, a.fabh, a.famc, a.khzq, a.dmms as khzqmc, a.khqs, a.znbs, a.jgmc as znbsmc, a.khzt , case when sum(case when a.pfzt='1' then 0 else 1 end )>0 then 0 else 1 end as pfzt from ( select fapz.khnf, fapz.fabh, fapz.famc, fapz.khzq, dmms.dmms , pffa.khqs, fapz.znbs, jg.jgmc , pffa.khzt, pffa.pfzt from znbs_zxpffa pffa inner join znbs_fapz fapz on pffa.fabh = fapz.fabh inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = fapz.znbs inner join csb_dmms dmms on lower(dmms.dmmc) = 'khzq' and cast(dmms.dmz as integer) = cast(fapz.khzq as integer) where fapz.khdx='1' and pffa.fabh = $fabh$ and fapz.khzq = $khzq$ and fapz.khnf = $khnf$ and pffa.khqs = $khqs$ and jg.khdxdh in($jgkhdxdh$) and pffa.khzt = '$khzt$' group by fapz.khnf, fapz.fabh, fapz.famc, fapz.khzq, dmms.dmms , pffa.khqs, fapz.znbs, jg.jgmc, pffa.khzt, pffa.pfzt )a group by a.khnf, a.fabh, a.famc, a.khzq, a.dmms , a.khqs, a.znbs, a.jgmc, a.khzt )a where 1=1 and a.pfzt=$pfzt$ order by a.khnf, a.khzq, a.khqs ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key, dmms as value from csb_dmms where 1=2
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select fabh as key, famc as value from znbs_fapz where khnf=$khnf$ and khzq=$khzq$ and 'test'<>'test$khzq$' and khdx = '1'
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key, dmms as value from csb_dmms where 1=2
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select dmz as key, dmms as value from csb_dmms where 1=2
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select distinct pffa.KHQS from znbs_zxpffa pffa inner join znbs_fapz fapz on pffa.fabh = fapz.fabh where fapz.khnf = $khnf$ and pffa.khzt = '1' and fapz.KHZQ=$khzq$
